languages.text: Но и пришлецы, вооруженные скудно и не гораздые в ратном искусстве, истребили немало насельников монастыря, поелику числом несметны были и отчаянием сильны зело.
But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.
languages.original_text: Но и пришлецы, вооруженные скудно и не гораздые в ратном искусстве, истребили немало насельников монастыря, поелику числом несметны были и отчаянием сильны зело.

traits.locale_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.
But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.
But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.
But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.
But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

languages.text: Pero los invasores, aunque su armamento era escaso y su capacidad de luchar prácticamente inexistente, lograron también abatir a muchos de los habitantes del monasterio, pues eran numerosos y su desesperación era absoluta.
languages.original_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

traits.locale_text: Pero los invasores, aunque su armamento era escaso y su capacidad de luchar prácticamente inexistente, lograron también abatir a muchos de los habitantes del monasterio, pues eran numerosos y su desesperación era absoluta.

languages.text: 但对外来者而言也同样如此。尽管他们只有劣质的武器装备，战斗技巧更是糟糕，但他们人数众多。拼死一战之下，也杀死了许多修道院的成员。
languages.original_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

traits.locale_text: 但对外来者而言也同样如此。尽管他们只有劣质的武器装备，战斗技巧更是糟糕，但他们人数众多。拼死一战之下，也杀死了许多修道院的成员。

languages.text: しかし侵入者達もまた、武器も戦闘技術も十分ではなかった。だが、その数の多さと必死さによって、多くの修道院の人間の命を奪った。
languages.original_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

traits.locale_text: しかし侵入者達もまた、武器も戦闘技術も十分ではなかった。だが、その数の多さと必死さによって、多くの修道院の人間の命を奪った。

languages.text: Aber auch die Eindringlinge, obwohl schlechter bewaffnet und noch weniger bewandert im Umgang damit, erschlugen viele Bewohner des Klosters, denn groß war ihre Zahl und noch größer ihre Verzweiflung.
languages.original_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

traits.locale_text: Aber auch die Eindringlinge, obwohl schlechter bewaffnet und noch weniger bewandert im Umgang damit, erschlugen viele Bewohner des Klosters, denn groß war ihre Zahl und noch größer ihre Verzweiflung.

languages.text: Mais les intrus, malgré leur armement famélique et leur pitoyable habileté au combat, tuent bien des résidents du monastère, car leur nombre et leur désespoir sont immenses.
languages.original_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

traits.locale_text: Mais les intrus, malgré leur armement famélique et leur pitoyable habileté au combat, tuent bien des résidents du monastère, car leur nombre et leur désespoir sont immenses.

languages.text: Mütecavizler de silahları kısıtlı ve muharebe yetenekleri daha da kısıtlı olmasına rağmen birçok manastır ahalisini öldürmeyi başardı. Nihayetinde sayıları daha fazla, umutsuzlukları ise çok daha büyüktü.
languages.original_text: But the interlopers, too, scant though their armament was and scanter their skill in battle, slew many among the monastery's dwellers, for great were their numbers and greater their desperation.

traits.locale_text: Mütecavizler de silahları kısıtlı ve muharebe yetenekleri daha da kısıtlı olmasına rağmen birçok manastır ahalisini öldürmeyi başardı. Nihayetinde sayıları daha fazla, umutsuzlukları ise çok daha büyüktü.
